children.name:
The camera MAST fired more than ten times than RHAZ
The camera MAST fired more than ten times than NAVCAM
The camera MAST fired more than ten times than FHAZ
The camera MAST fired more than ten times than CHEMCAM
Validate that the amounts of pictures that each "Curiosity" camera took on 1000 Mars sol is not greater than 10 times the amount taken by other cameras on the same date.
